snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday’s selections include a look at some major cropping of movies on Netflix, and a taxi app’s one-day promotional deliveries of ice...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday’s selections include a look at some major cropping of movies on Netflix, and a taxi app’s one-day promotional deliveries of ice cream on demand for a price.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: The Netflix Crop and the Ice Cream App
